com.wit.and.widget.adapter

Class OptBaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
        • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.OptBaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OptMultiAdapter

    public abstract class OptBaseAdapter
extends BaseAdapter

    public abstract class

    OptBaseAdapter

    extends BaseAdapter

    Class Overview

    Optimized base adapter to handle optimization of creating views for the ListView, GridView, ... items.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    BaseAdapter

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                        android.view.View convertView,
                        android.view.ViewGroup root)

      • onCreateItemView

        protected abstract android.view.View onCreateItemView(int position,
                                 android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                 android.view.ViewGroup root)

        protected View onCreateItemView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup root)

        Invoked to create view for the item from the adapter data set. This is invoked only if the convert view is equal to null. To create view you can use the given inflater or create it manually.

        Parameters:
        position -
        inflater -
        root -
        Returns:
        Created item view.

      • onBindItemView

        protected abstract void onBindItemView(int position,
                  java.lang.Object viewHolder)

        protected void onBindItemView(int position, Object viewHolder)

        Invoked to bind item view by data. This is invoked whether the getView() method on the adapter is called.

        Parameters:
        position -
        viewHolder - View holder of the actual item view on the given position. This is also holder which was set to the view by onGetItemViewHolder() method while was view created.

      • onGetItemViewHolder

        protected abstract java.lang.Object onGetItemViewHolder(int position,
                                   android.view.View itemView)

        protected Object onGetItemViewHolder(View itemView)

        Invoked to obtain view holder for the actually created item view.

        Parameters:
        position -
        itemView - View returned by onCreateItemView method.
        Returns:
